title: Anorrack's Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-trans-pride |trans-pride-logo= --] |trans-pride-footer= --]]] [[module CSS]] div.pullquote { border: 1px dashed #999; padding: 1em; text-align: center; margin: 1em; } [[/module]] [[>]] [[module Rate]] [[/>]] [[html]]
[[/html]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[=]] ++ {{NEW UPDATES}} **[[[GUNSIGHT]]]** @@ @@ **[[[blood-on-the-ice|Blood on the Ice (An Investigative Sports Report)]]]** @@ @@ **[[[The Fruit of Eight Millennia]]]** @@ @@ **[[[SLAYER OF WICKEDNESS]]]** @@ @@ [[/=]] [[/div]] [[tabview]] [[tab ______]] [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/anorrack-s-author-page/fileface2.png]] [[/tab]] [[tab Author]] [[div style="background: #EBD5B3;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Special Elite';"]] **Author:** Anorrack **Joined:** mid-2018 **Occupation:** current law student, former astrophysicist **Fun Fact:** Certified to drive a forklift in the state of Alaska. **Biography:** Got drawn into the site by reading and doing some of the contests. I started to drift away from the site, but talking to a couple people made me stay. I still lurk on the site here and there, and post an article once in a blue moon. Have a look at my catalog and see what you like :). **Living Will:** In the case of my disappearance or unfortunate demise, my articles are to be auctioned off, with the minimum bid being five cents. If the articles cannot be auctioned off, the items are to be given to charity, preferably to one that treats those afflicted with writer's block. If no charity exists, then I dunno, throw em in the river or something. [[/div]] [[/tab]] [[tab SCPs]] [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-8968]]]- **Lost in Transit** [[module ListPages name="scp-8968" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //If the Artifact or the location of such is not provided, we may issue a public statement regarding the destruction of sacred artifacts supranatural and mundane. So where is it?// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[scp-8891|SCP-8891]]]- **Nervous Tick** [[module ListPages name="scp-8891" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Documented side effects include: relapse of prior symptoms, implant rejection, bacterial infection, [18 ENTRIES OMITTED FOR BREVITY], stroke, seizures, paralysis, coma, and death.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[scp-8842|SCP-8842]]]- **Another Nazi Wonderweapon** [[module ListPages name="scp-8842" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //The very existence of this technology threatens to strangle our newborn Veil in its cradle. **This must not come to pass.**// Companion piece to [[[Sifting Through The Sand]]]. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[scp-8660|SCP-8660]]]- **The Empty Birdcage** [[module ListPages name="scp-8660" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Before Benar could fully explain his rehearsed cover story, POI-61-Gil burst into the room and declared that Benar "will become one of [his] exalted warriors in the quest to free [his] people" and that they would "fight and die alongside each other, as brothers in blood". Benar agreed to these terms.// Coauthored with [[*user TyGently]]. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[scp-8235|SCP-8235]]]- **Magic, Unchained** [[module ListPages name="scp-8235" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //**Special Containment Procedures:** All existing theories are being reevaluated... **Description:** SCP-8000 is colloquially known as// magic. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-7890]]]- **M.T.F. S.O.L., S.N.A.F.U.** [[module ListPages name="scp-7890" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //...the Puebla Cartel has developed a bespoke manufacturing process taking advantage of the inherently large EVE output of human sacrifice (utilizing enhanced Nordic pagan rituals) as a crude replacement.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-6756]]]- **DUMP YOUR PLASTIC IN THE OCEAN** [[module ListPages name="scp-6756" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Every three months, SCP-6756 should be transported to the Gulf of Mexico and seeded into the Gulf Stream via the SCPS Feisty Frolic, maintaining current particulate density in the North Atlantic Gyre.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-5859]]]- **The PENTAGRAM Papers** [[module ListPages name="scp-5859" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Engine induced to think of the intricacies of Marxism and Leninism... Subject rendered comatose.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-5567]]]- **Poorly Loved, Poorly Lived** [[module ListPages name="scp-5567" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //"Could feel ink dripping from my back, the car almost falling apart from the weight of an animator's pencil pressing against it. I didn't feel… finished."// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-5350]]]- **Oculoma** [[module ListPages name="scp-5350" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Symptoms can include fever, cough, sore throat, fatigue, vomiting, diarrhea, upset stomach, eyes present on the mouth and tongue, bloated stomach or scopaesthesia (the feeling of someone watching you).// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-5116]]]- **The Art of the Deal with the Devil** [[module ListPages name="scp-5116" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //You have been chosen to defend ##purple|Arcadia##.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-4641]]]- **Get a Clue** [[module ListPages name="scp-4641" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Game Lost. Two weeks later, Jeanine Oswalt was strangled to death by her ex-boyfriend.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-4724]]]- **Making a New Life** [[module ListPages name="scp-4724" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //After several instances left the property... local ranchers and veterinarians went to the farm, where they intercepted, baptized, and euthanized new instances as they emerged.// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-4110]]]- **The Ultimate Cosplay** [[module ListPages name="scp-4110" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //**SPOOK** your friends, **SCARE** your relatives, and make your neighbors **SHRIEK** with fright with this exciting creation brought to you by the people at Dr. Wondertainment & Co. Dr. Wondertainment's Wonder-Costumes™!// [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #e7c9a9;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] [[[SCP-3946]]]- **Amphitrite's Curse, Scylla's Wrath** [[module ListPages name="scp-3946" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //"In those dark waters the most beautiful song was ringing out across the depths, in a language unrecognizable to the ear, but yet filled with grief and loss."// [[/div]] [[/tab]] [[tab GOI Formats]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[blood-on-the-ice|Blood on the Ice (An Investigative Sports Report)]]]** [[module ListPages name="blood-on-the-ice" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //...it's all a plot against me, God's most fragile lesbian, to force me to go outside during the summer to an open-air ice hockey stadium and watch beautiful women give themselves chronic traumatic encephalopathy for the love of the game. Hey, at least it's not football.// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[ptt-1666-gray-templum|PTT-1666-Gray-Templum — "Irkalla, House of Dumuzi, the Netherworld"]]]** [[module ListPages name="ptt-1666-gray-templum" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //"Let all who oppose me tremble like leaves in the wind, let their steel rust and iron weep, for I am Gilgamesh, slayer of the Bull of Heaven, slayer of Humbaba, slayer of lions, the first hero, Mightiest Son, two parts god and one part man! As Shamash wills it, it will be done!"// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/uiu-file-2003-112 UIU File: 2003-112 (OPERATION: PANDORA)]** [[module ListPages name="uiu-file-2003-112" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //Representatives of Golemancy United, proprietary owners of the construct, have fervently denied publicly any and all allegations of the tampering of their products, excepting acts of Divine Will.// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/uiu-file-2024-092 UIU File: 2024-092 (The SAINT SEBASTIAN SLASHER)]** [[module ListPages name="uiu-file-2024-092" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //The tentacle led to a puncture wound in his abdomen, ultimately connected to a small, plastic object buried in his chest cavity that resembled a child's toy boat covered in tumors.// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/candy-cat Herman Fuller Presents: The Candified Cat ]** [[module ListPages name="candy-cat" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //ONE NIGHT ONLY, ONLY ONE CHANCE TO FEAST YOUR EYES AND YOUR STOMACH ON OUR RARE CENTRAL AMERICAN CANDIFIED CAT.// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/uiu-file-1970-034 UIU Case File 1970-034 "A Whale of a Time"]** [[module ListPages name="uiu-file-1970-034" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //**Capabilities:** Production of explosive liquid, mostly ceased after immolation.// [[/div]] [[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background-color: #f7f3e8; padding:13px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critterprofile-otis Critter Profile: Otis]** [[module ListPages name="critterprofile-otis" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] //If Otis is scared by something (which happens a lot), everything around him will fall asleep, quick as a match.// [[/div]] [[/tab]] [[tab Tales]] [[div style="background: #EBD5B3;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[quinn-law-hub|Dead Reckoning]]]** [[collapsible show="+ See Tales" hide="- Hide Tales"]] [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[dead-men-tell-tales|Dead Men Tell Tales]]]** [[module ListPages name="dead-men-tell-tales" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] "Dead Men Tell No Tales" is an old adage, which means killing a person is an easy way to prevent them from leaking secrets to other people. For a necromancer, however, the saying doesn't hold water. So who, exactly, kidnapped the governor? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[dead-mans-hand|Dead Man's Hand]]]** [[module ListPages name="dead-mans-hand" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] The hand that western lawman Wild Bill had when he was killed over a game of poker, consisting of two pairs of black aces and black eights. Considered bad luck by the superstitious, and a portent of things to come. Will Quinn Law shake off her bad luck, or we she stumble into more trouble? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[dead-mans-switch|Dead Man's Switch]]]** [[module ListPages name="dead-mans-switch" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A type of switch that only activates once the user is killed, incapacitated, or knocked unconscious. Useful for bombs, traps, or for when a UIU agent wakes up something that shouldn't have been touched. When will Quinn's bad luck run out? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[dead-mans-secrets|Dead Man's Secrets]]]** [[module ListPages name="dead-mans-secrets" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] Two men can keep a secret, if one of them is dead. What is hidden in this secret government facility? What mysteries will Quinn Law uncover? And when will she be able to finally rest? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[digging-two-graves|Digging Two Graves]]]** [[module ListPages name="digging-two-graves" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A brief interstitial wherein a necromancer talks to a corpse about death. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[Dead Man Walking]]]** [[module ListPages name="dead-man-walking" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A person who doesn’t know they are already dead. They could be reanimated, a soul beyond the grave, or the Lighthouse Mafia. Can Quinn and the UIU stop them from completing their master plan, or will Paramax turn into a smoking hole in reality? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[/collapsible]] [[module ListPages name="quinn-law-hub" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EBD5B3;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[varuna-s-war|Varuna's War]]]** [[collapsible show="+ See Tales" hide="- Hide Tales"]] [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[walkin-slow|Don't Go Walking Slow]]]** [[module ListPages name="walkin-slow" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A British platoon is stuck in the Burmese Jungle. Will the enemy kill them first, or will the monsters underground? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[voice-of-rage-and-ruin|Voice of Rage and Ruin]]]** [[module ListPages name="voice-of-rage-and-ruin" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] Behind enemy lines in the Pacific. A resurrection ritual gone awry. Forget the others, can Kiran save himself? [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[talking-to-someone-else|Talking to Someone Else]]]** [[module ListPages name="talking-to-someone-else" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] In the aftermath of battle and death, the survivors sit down to talk about war, fate, and their future. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[/collapsible]] [[module ListPages name="varuna-s-war" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EBD5B3;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[dead-king-s-march|Dead King's March]]]** [[collapsible show="+ See Tales" hide="- Hide Tales"]] [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[To Make Meat of Clay]]]** [[module ListPages name="to-make-meat-of-clay" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] Gilgamesh strikes at the heart of Nergal's territory to seize a great and terrible prize. Coauthored with [[*user Intercedent]]. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[SLAYER OF WICKEDNESS]]]** [[module ListPages name="slayer-of-wickedness" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] In the penultimate tale for Dead King's March, Gilgamesh takes on the capital of Nergal's empire, and challenges the dread god to a contest of strength, with the fate of all of the Netherworld hanging in the balance. Coauthored with [[*user Intercedent]] and [[*user TyGently]]. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[The Fruit of Eight Millennia]]]** [[module ListPages name="the-fruit-of-eight-millennia" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] Gilgamesh explores the underworld with a new ally, and says goodbye to an old friend. Coauthored with [[*user TyGently]]. [[/div]] [[/collapsible]] [[module ListPages name="dead-king-s-march" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EBD5B3;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[red-queen-s-race|Red Queen's Race]]]** [[collapsible show="+ See Tales" hide="- Hide Tales"]] [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[GREENLIGHT]]]** [[module ListPages name="greenlight" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A Foundation at war. A Site raided and pillaged. A nuclear flower blooms on an Aleutian island. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[GUNSIGHT]]]** [[module ListPages name="gunsight" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] An intestine tightens. A corresponding stock rises by seven points. The Foundation dies in nineteen hours. The market has already priced it in. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[/collapsible]] [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[sifting-through-the-sand|Sifting Through The Sand]]]** [[module ListPages name="sifting-through-the-sand" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] Nazis and werewolves, mummies and genies, Frankenstein and flying saucers collide in the Valley of the Kings in a battle for the fate of the North African Theater and the world at large. Companion piece to [[[SCP-8842]]]. [[/div]] @@ @@ [[div style="background: #EFE2BA;" "float: center; border: solid 1px #444444; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); font-family: 'Courier Prime';"]] **[[[new-nightmare|Archer Row's New Nightmare]]]** [[module ListPages name="new-nightmare" category="*" limit="1" separate="no"]] (+%%rating%%) / (%%comments%% comments) [[/module]] A Site Halloween. A deadly killer. A narrative falling apart. Can the metafictional researchers of Site-76 stop the slasher archetype before it eats the entire Site whole? --tabs-bottom-border-color: var(--manila-edge); .CS-title { font-family: 'alpha_echoregular'; } .page { display: block; overflow: hidden; font-family: "Monotype"; font-style: normal; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-color: transparent; background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(202, 219, 228) 0%, rgb(255,244,139) 8%); background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0px 8px; background-repeat: repeat; background-size: 100% 20px; border: 1px solid #CCC; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) } .mz-paper{ border: 3.5px double #555; padding:0.5rem 1rem; margin: 1rem 1rem; background-size:100px; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: repeat; background-color:var(--mz-paper-bg); background-image: var(--icon-noise); } .genblock { background-color: rgb(var(--printer-paper)); background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:twin-files/paper-texture.png"); background-repeat: repeat; background-size: 100%; color: rgb(var(--ink-blot)); font-family: var(--printer-paper-font); border: 1px solid white; border-color: rgb(var(--papers-edge)); padding: 1.5em 1em 1.5em 1em; } .page p, .page ul { line-height: 20px; margin: 0; } .ticker { padding: 10px 5px 1.1em 3.7em; font-family: var(--ticker-font); font-size: 110%; font-weight: 400; color: #000; background: repeat-y url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme%3Atwin-files/tickerback.png"); background-position: center top; background-size: 100%; border: 2px solid #D8D6CA; border-style: dashed solid dashed; border-width: medium 2px 0px; } .chew-bottom, .chew-top{ --NOTEPAGE-txt_border-size:0.8em; --NOTEPAGE-before_area:header; --NOTEPAGE-after_area:footer; --NOTEPAGE-side_width: 100%; --NOTEPAGE-side_height: 1rem; --MASK-chew_repeat: repeat-x; --MASK-chew_size:14rem; --NOTEPAGE-before_display:none; --NOTEPAGE-after_display:none; --NOTEPAGE-header_font-size:0; --NOTEPAGE-footer_font-size:0; --NOTE-quote_width:100%; --NOTE-quote_bg-size:3em; --NOTE-quote_height:3em; --NOTE-quote-side_clip:inset(0 0 25% 0); --NOTE-quote-side_position: 0em 0; --NOTE-quote-side_repeat:repeat-x; } .chew-top { --NOTEPAGE-before_display:inline-grid; --MASK-chew-before_margin:0px 0 -1px 0; --NOTEPAGE-footer_font-size:0.8em; --NOTEPAGE-header_display:none; } .chew-bottom { --MASK-chew-after_margin: -1px 0 0 0; --NOTEPAGE-after_display:inline-grid; --NOTEPAGE-header_font-size:1.5em; } .chew-bottom .notepage-body:after{ --MASK-chew-after: var(--MASK-chew222); } .chew-top .notepage-body:before{ --MASK-chew-before: var(--MASK-chew222); transform: scaleY(-1); } .mmposter-wrap{ display: flex; justify-content: center ; flex-wrap: wrap; } .mmposter-cell{ min-width: 10%; justify-self: center; } .mmposter-blockquote .mmposter-cell{ min-width: 50%; } .mmposter-semi .mmposter-cell{ width: 50% ; } .mmposter-semi .mmposter-cell span[style*="underline"]{ display: none } .flex-pc{ display: flex; } .flex-wrap{ display: flex; justify-content: space-around; } .flex-wrap div{ margin: 0 0.5rem; width: 100%; } @media (max-width: 500px) { .flex-pc{ display: block; } .flex-wrap{ flex-wrap:wrap; } .mmposter-semi .mmposter-cell, .mmposter-cell{ width: 100%; min-width: auto; } .mmposter-right{ margin-top:2rem; } .mob-breakkkk{ display: block } } .clip-wrap div { max-width: 60%; margin: 1rem auto; width: 60%; } .clip-wrap .clip-img, .clip-wrap .clip-body { border: solid 2px rgb(var(--clip-border,0,0,0)); background-color: rgb(var(--clip-bg, 244, 244, 244)); box-sizing: border-box; position: relative; z-index: 0; padding: 0.5rem; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::before,.clip-wrap .clip-img::after, .clip-wrap .clip-body::before,.clip-wrap .clip-body::after { content:''; position: absolute; pointer-events: none; border: solid 0.25rem var(--color-darker); transform: rotate(25deg); } .clip-wrap .clip-img::before,.clip-wrap .clip-img::after { border: solid 0.25rem var(--color-darker); } .clip-wrap .clip-img::before, .clip-wrap .clip-body::before { right: 0.45rem; height: 36px; width: 9px; top: -0.45rem; border-radius: 0 0 2rem 2rem; border-top: none; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::after, .clip-wrap .clip-body::after { top: -24px; right: -0.5rem; height: 16px; width: 14px; border-radius: 2rem 2rem 0 0; border-bottom: solid 0.55rem transparent; z-index: -1; } .clip-wrap .clip-body img, .clip-wrap .clip-img { border: 0.15rem solid var(--color-darkest); width: max-content; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::before { right: -0.2rem; top: -0.45rem; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::after { right: -0.8rem; height: 45px; } .clip-wrap .clip-img { padding: 0rem; border: 0.12rem solid var(--color-darkest); box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 9px rgba(50,50,50, 0.1), 0px 0px 0px 12px rgba(150,150,150, 0.1); } @media (max-width: 500px) { .clip-wrap{ max-width: 100%; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::before, .clip-wrap .clip-body::before { right: 0.3rem; height: 1.4rem; width: 0.4rem; top: 0rem; } .clip-wrap .clip-img::after, .clip-wrap .clip-body::after { top: -1rem; right: -0.5rem; height: 1rem; width: 0.7rem; } } @import url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:twin-files/stylesheet-alt.css'); font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold; } .yui-navset .yui-content { background: #F9D986; border: solid 2px #000000; border-radius: 5px; } .yui-navset .yui-nav a em { padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px; } .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a em { padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px; } div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a, div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus, div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover { background: #0a0037; border: solid 3px #ffffff; } [[/module]] [[footnoteblock]]
